scripts.clear:dirs: clear() { pnpm bin:rm ts/* def/*.js build $1 $2 $3 $4; }; clear
scripts.clear:tables: clear() { pnpm -s log:msg "Clearing $1 table directory"; pnpm -s bin:rm tables-$1; }; clear
scripts.clear:mod: clear() { pnpm -s log:msg "Clearing $1 directories"; pnpm -s clear:dirs $1 $2 $3 $4; }; clear
scripts.def:compile: pnpm log:msg 'Compiling font definition'; tsc -p tsconfig/def.json
scripts.def:run: pnpm -s log:msg 'Processing font definition'; node def/mathjax-newcm.js
scripts.compile:def: def() { pnpm clean:$1 && pnpm def:compile && pnpm -s def:run $1; }; def
scripts.compile:tsc: cmp() { pnpm log:msg "Compiling $1 typescript files"; tsc -p tsconfig/$1.json; }; cmp
scripts.compile:all: all() { pnpm compile:def $1 && pnpm compile:tsc $1; }; all
scripts.make:one: one() { pnpm log:msg "Building $1"; echo; ../node_modules/@mathjax/src/components/bin/makeAll --$2 $3 $4 build/$1; }; one
scripts.make:font: font() { pnpm -- make:one chtml $1 $2 $3 && pnpm -- make:one svg $1 $2 $3; }; font
scripts.cjs:make-font: pnpm -s log:msg 'Making cjs font'; pnpm -s -- make:font cjs --bundle-cjs
scripts.mjs:make-font: pnpm -s log:msg 'Making mjs font'; pnpm -s -- make:font mjs
scripts.combine:one: one() { pnpm -- make:one $1 $2 --build && pnpm -- combine:cmp $1 $2 $3; }; one
scripts.combine:all: combine() { pnpm -- combine:one chtml $1 $2 $3 && pnpm -- combine:one svg $1 $2 $3; }; combine
scripts.build:cmp: cmp() { pnpm $2:compile && echo && pnpm make:one $1 $2 $3 $4; }; cmp
scripts.build:one: one() { pnpm make:one $1 $2 && pnpm make-one tex-mml-$1-mathjax-newcm $2; }; one
scripts.build:all: build() { pnpm $1:compile && echo && pnpm build:one chtml $1 && pnpm build:one svg $1; }; build
scripts.mjs:build: pnpm -s log:header 'Building mjs'; pnpm -s build:all mjs
scripts.table: table() { pnpm -s clear:tables $1 && pnpm -s log:msg "Creating $1 tables" && node ../bin/makeTables.js $1 mathjax-newcm; }; table
scripts.tables: pnpm -s table svg && pnpm -s table chtml
